content: देश्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दिश्-कर्भणिण्यत् देश-यत् वा] {@--1@} To be pointed out or proved. {@--2@} Local, provincial. {@--3@} Born in a country, native. {@--4@} Genuine, of genuine descent. {@--5@} Being on the spot or place (where anything is due). {@--6@} Not far from, almost; see देशीय above. --श्यः {@--1@} An eye-witness of anything अभियोक्ता दिशेद्देश्यं <ls>Ms. 8. 52.-53</ls>. {@--2@} The inhabitant of a country. --श्यं The statement of a question or argument, the thing to be proved or substantiated (पूर्वपक्ष).
